**The Chapter on Jade Chambers**

The *Inner Transmission of the Perfected Lord Wang of Pure Emptiness* states: His personal name was Bao, styled Zideng. He dwelt in a chamber of stillness and seclusion, concealing his form and practicing pure fasting.

The *Lower Scroll of the Jade Characters of Inner Sounds* states: The *Inner Sounds* is sealed within the stone coffer of the Cavern-Chamber of the Southern River. Some scriptures also refer to the coffer as a "vault." Thus, the *Five Talismans* states: The numinous writings of the Nine Heavens are likewise sealed within a stone vault. It further states: The numinous writings of the Nine Heavens and the true treasures of the Three Heavens were compiled by Yu the Great into the *Scriptures of Numinous Treasure*—one copy concealed in a stone coffer, another in a secluded cavern-chamber.

The *Scripture of the Eight Gates of the Mysterious Mother* states: The Jade Chamber of Scattered Flowers, wherein the Three Primordial Ladies of the Plain of White reside.

The *First Scroll of the Scripture of Original Forms* states: Ascend beyond the supreme Dao, the Chamber of Purity and Eternal Joy.

The *Scripture of the Three Primes and the True One* states: The Chamber of Linxiao, where the Youth of the Eastern Sea received the scriptures, located on Mount Donghua of the Shangqing realm in the Square Cauldron.

The *Declarations of the Perfected* states: The Palace of Grand Existence, where Sima Jizhu concealed himself. It further states: The Chamber of Tranquil Repose, where Master Juan sat. It further states: The Jade-Flower Chamber, wherein the *Jade Writ of Cinnabar Scenery* is kept. It further states: The Purple Hall and Golden Chamber, where the Perfected of Inscribed Stone reside.

The *Scriptures of Highest Clarity* states: The Chamber of Towering Peaks, where the Lord of the Jade Dawn dwells. It further states: The Cinnabar Curtain and Green Chamber, where the Perfected of the Great Prime resides.

The *Scripture of Original Forms* states: The Seven-Jewel Chamber, where the Venerable Lord of Stillness expounded the Dao. It further states: The Jade Chamber of Mysterious Nourishment, where the Venerable Lord of Stillness resided while preaching to the Nirgrantha. It further states: In the Crimson Radiance Kingdom, within the Vermilion Chamber, the Heavenly Worthy expounded the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*. It further states: The Heavenly Worthy roamed the Five-Colored Jade Chamber of the Kingdom of Dharma-Brightness, seated upon a lion-throne of treasured jade and a high dais of singing phoenix-jade, where he proclaimed the Dao and delivered all beings. It further states: Now I hear that my master, in this Seven-Jewel Purple Chamber, elucidates the teachings of the Dao.

The *Upper Scroll of the Ordinances of the Great Perfected* states: The Chamber of the Immortal Swallows, where the Heavenly Master instructed and transformed.

The *Jade Dawn Luminous Mirror* states: The Golden Flower Feminine Chamber of the Jade Dawn of the Great Mystery, wherein the Three Primordial Ladies of the Plain of White reside.

The *Hidden Words of the Numinous Treasure* states: The Yellow-Quartered Chamber, a mountain excavated by the host of dragons.

The *Lower Scroll of the Jade Instructions Scripture* states: On the Vermilion Slope of the Southern Garden, the Three Primes’ Cavern-Chamber is sealed with jade inscriptions.

The *Scripture of the Three Primes and the True One* states: The Chamber of Mysterious Essence, the dwelling place of the Three Ones, the Venerable Lords within the body.

The *Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern* states: There is the Chamber of the Upper Flower, wherein a blue-green qi arises of itself, called the "Incense of Reversed Fragrance," whose scent, against the wind, reaches three thousand leagues, its fragrance yet penetrating the Purple Palace. It further states: The Lord of the Great Dao of the Jade Dawn loosened his sash in the Jade-Reflecting Chamber.

The *Jade Instructions of the Great Cavern* states: The Lords of the Three Primes entered the Chamber of Flowing Ease.

The *Lower Scroll of the Scripture of the Great Cavern* states: The Feathered Chamber of Mysterious Clouds, wherein the scriptures of the Yellow and Old Primordial Lord are sealed.

The *Scripture of Original Forms* states: In the Crimson Radiance Kingdom, within the Vermilion Chamber, the Heavenly Worthy expounded the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*.

The *Inner Transmission of Emperor Wu of Han* states: The mound of Square Zhang is the Chamber of Governance and Destiny.

The *Record of the Ten Continents* states: On the Canghai Island stands the Chamber of Accumulated Stones, abundant in rocks resembling the Eight Stones—brain-stone and cassia-blossom. There is also a Purple-Stone Palace-Chamber, the administrative seat of the Nine Elder Immortals.

The *Declarations of the Perfected* states: Zhang Lizheng and Zhi Mingqi of Mount Heng studied the Dao, riding the void to ascend to heaven, and now dwell in the Whirlwind Chamber of the Square Cauldron as Perfected of the Highest Rank.

The *Precious Scripture of the Five Elders* states: Voices resound in the Chamber of the Five Elders; spirits ascend above the Three Clarities.

A commentary on the *Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern* states: Mount Xiuhua, called by the Perfected of the Great Ultimate the "Cinnabar Chamber of Perfect Radiance," the dwelling of the Five Numinous Lords.

A commentary on the *Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern* states: The Lord of the Azure Youth ascended Cloud-Wave Mountain and entered the Chamber of the Eastern Flower. It further states: The Lord of Azure Essence ascended the Mountain of Purple Emptiness and transformed within the Jade Chamber.

The *Record of the Ten Continents* states: On Kunlun stands the Chamber of Jade-Flower, where the Queen Mother of the West resides.

The *Scripture of the Cavern of Perfection* states: The Jade Chamber is where the Three Nines’ Plain Speech and the Supreme Transformation of the Mysterious Cinnabar conceal the Dao of the Three Perfected and the Cavern of Primordiality. It further states: Within it are stored the *Jade Tallies of the Three Primes* and the *Scripture of the Three Primes’ Array*.

The Crooked Chamber is where the Lord Emperor of the Heavenly Thearch of Grand Tenuity conceals the writings of the Nine Elixirs of the Highest Immortals, and where the Primordial Five Elders further conceal the Five Scrolls of True Writ.

The *Luminous Ordinances of the Four Poles* states: The Western Chamber of Tortoise Mountain, where the scriptures of the Southern Cavern-Heaven of Wangwu are fully preserved.

The *Fifth Scroll of the Ten Weft Scriptures of the Five Thousand Words* states: Within the Mystery of the Celestial Canopy dwell the Supreme Perfected.

The *Scripture of the Wisdom of Highest Clarity* states: The Chamber of Layered Mounds in the Luminous Observatory of Harmonious Dawn, the leisurely abode of the Heavenly Worthy of the Great Dao.

The *Orthodox Methods of the Three Heavens of Highest Clarity* states: The Chamber of the Sun-Crow, wherein the writings of the Orthodox Methods of the Three Heavens of the Primordial expel the texts of the Six Heavens.

The *Scripture of the Three Primes and the True One* states: The Chamber of Linxiao is where the methods of the Three Primes and the True One are concealed. It further states: The Yellow Gate and Purple Portal of the Chamber of Mysterious Essence, the constant dwelling place of the Three Ones, the Venerable Lords within the body.

The *Mysterious Record of the Seven Sages of the Jade Thearch* states: The Chamber of Kunlun, the source of the Northern Cavern, where the Nine Heavens of Returning Heaven, the White Tallies, and the Azure Registers are kept.

The *Scripture of the Three Dao in Harmonious Practice* states: The Chamber of the Southern Cavern, wherein Lord Wang sealed the scriptures of the Three Dao.

The *Scripture of the Golden Tablet and Jade Characters* states: The Chamber of the Square Cauldron, the dwelling of the Supreme Lord of Great Simplicity.

chunks.original_text: 《大洞玉经》云：又有东华之室，青童乘玉雕之耕，御圆殊之气，而入此室也。 又云：太老之室，在上清之天，八皇老君乘广琅之车而入之也。 又云：流刚山上有晖景之室，西王母之所治。 《龟山元箓》云：玉华之室，丹景玉文在其内。 《神咒第五经》云：中有九合之室，太上在其内，端坐思惟，何国苦乐，劫数近远，众生悠悠，何所趣向也。 《登真隐诀》云：东海劳盛山北阴之室，有霍林仙人韩众，撰服御之方也。 《真诰第七》云：仙人郭四朝歌曰：高皇齐龙轮，遂回北华室。 四朝为玉台执盖郎，故云高皇齐龙轮。 又云：方隅山下有洞室名曰方源馆，幽人居之。 《大洞经》中卷玉清玉咒曰：遂隐上清室，羽明帝一房也。 又云：解带玉映室，乘素入四明。 又云：受福东霞室，反胎朱火度。 又云：长寝羽台上，固神五老室。 又云：浑合帝一室，五老变孩蒙。 又云：上朝帝一室，解带皇一阶。 又云：反胎朱大室，更受洞中生。 《大洞真经》云：阳山寂洞有元虚三瑶之室，栢成芝高隐处也。 又云：世世解结，上生帝房人保飙之室。 又云：五帝之气无於阴极之室。 《飞龙隐诀》云：北极真公治於北极广灵之室。 又云：《飞行羽经》封之峨媚山金台室。 《大洞雌一篇目》云：三元君在元虚之室。 《上清变化七十四方经》云：南极真人藏上清经於瑶台丹灵云宫九折洞室，室有通明自然之光。 《飞行羽经》上云：太上飞行空常变化隐文，秘於九洞之室也。 《飞行羽经》、《升玄上记》云：峨眉山金台之室，飞玄羽经秘其内。 《洞神经第十二》云：控量太霞室，齐轮九天庭。 《五胜符》云：东胜之符，秘在玄瑶青林之楼，崇丘兰琼之室。 《本相经》第八云：东方浮黎国，有九合之室，天尊登此焚身形之所。 《本相经第十八》云：玄台六合室，自然登举行。 又云：变化紫气室，目睹不得入。 又云：神弘恒熙悦，七宝紫金室。 《第二十经》云：南海外阿阤加国王，有女名好求，仙去，王即於其处起集灵台，造神仙宫、三师堂、说文室，以为广度，一千人在其中。 《第一经》云：仙人范则子於西那王国浮罗岳中肃台室，说太清中品六百卷也。 《三皇朝仪》云：列列广寒庭，辽辽燕山室。 《海空经第一》云：习观三相，明了四意者，则为入智慧室也。 《高上虚皇君道经第一》云：羽明帝一房，遂隐上清室。 《内音玉字下》云：宗飘天宾黄房之室，一各玉客之堂，真晨道君治其中。 《大洞玉经三十九章》云：道君解襟带於玉状之室，乘八素八於四明之门。 四明之门者，上清玉帝之南门也。 又云：化玉室，青精君所游处也。 又云：太虚之天，太霞之中有彭墟之室，结白气以造构，令九云而立宇，紫烟重排，神华所聚，故号曰彭墟之室。 太虚元君之所处也。 又云：青童君登云波之山，东华之室也。 《八素阳诃》九章云：静翳九灵室，动周二度变。 《三皇经》云：既入空洞室，何忧道不成。 《起尸度亡人经》云：辽辽玄中堂，窈窕无上室。 《三元品戒》云：罪福简录封於九源洞室。 又云：功过薄录封於九河洞室。 又云：罪福报应封於汤泉洞室。 《本际经第四》云：引进我等，令入法墙处，无为室也。 诸经中室名大有，此不具录之也。

The *Fifth Scripture of Divine Incantations* states: Within lies the Chamber of Nine Unions, where the Most High resides, seated in contemplation—pondering which lands suffer or prosper, how near or distant the kalpas, and where the multitudes of sentient beings drift and turn.

The *Concealed Instructions on Ascending to Perfection* states: North of Mount Laosheng in the Eastern Sea lies the Yin Chamber, where the immortal Huolin, Han Zhong, compiled methods of ingestion and refinement.

The *Catalogue of the Feminine One of the Great Cavern* states: The Lords of the Three Primes reside in the Chamber of Primordial Void.

The *Seventy-Four Methods of Supreme Purity’s Transformations* states: The Perfected of the Southern Culmen concealed the scriptures of Supreme Purity within the Ninefold Winding Cavern Chamber of the Jasper Terrace and Cinnabar Spirit Cloud Palace, where the chamber is suffused with luminous natural radiance.

The upper scroll of the *Scripture of Flying Feathers* states: The Most High’s flying, soaring, and ever-changing hidden texts are secreted within the Chambers of the Nine Caverns.

The *Scripture of Flying Feathers* and the *Upper Records of Ascending Mystery* state: The Golden Terrace Chamber of Mount Emei holds the *Flying Mystery Feather Scripture* concealed within.

The *Twelfth Scripture of the Cavern Spirit* states: "Measuring the Great Rosy Chamber, aligning with the wheels of the Nine Heavens."

**Chapter on Divine Abodes and Numinous Temples**

The *Scripture of Original Form, First Scroll* states: "The immortal temple is the hall where divine immortals reside."

The *Twenty-First Scripture* states: "The King of Donghua constructed the Temple of the Seven Celestial Governances for women to dwell in and cultivate the Dao. It accords with the twenty-eight lunar lodges, and its palaces have twenty-eight gates."

The *Scripture of the Great Kalpa* states: "The Perfected of the Northern Dark Record traversed the Dark Valley to reach the Upper Abode." And: "The demon Mara’s great thousandfold abode—where the host of Perfected ones wander the Three Realms." And: "The Upper Minister’s High Sovereign Abode, beneath which lies the Pool of Ablution."

The *Lesser Rites of the Grand Perfected, Section on Regulating with Bells and Drums* states: "Whenever registers are received, the abodes of cultivation all possess scriptures, and the place is called the Gate of the Dao. Establishing the Orthodox Dharma to transform the people and propagate teachings is called the Gate of the Dao. To the left and front of the cultivation abode, upon the scripture platform, gold bells and jade chimes are hung."

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Fourth Scroll, "Discerning Destiny"*: The Lady of Purple Tenuity of the Dark Mound sang:
*"Sweeping sleeves in the cloud-forest abode,
Binding hair to return to youthful infancy.
How fleeting, this dwelling without a home—
Can right and wrong ever be contrived?"*

The *Miscellaneous Chapters* of the *Zhuangzi* state: "The abode of great peace and stability emits the radiance of heaven."

The *Inner Chapters* state: "The body abides in the abode of utmost unity, meeting in the repository of inevitability."

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Fourth Scroll*: The Lady of Right Florescence sang:
*"Wind coils through the empty, cavernous abode,
Divine sounds arise with each movement.
Hand in hand with the Weaving Maiden, we dance,
Shoulder to shoulder in the gourd-garden court."*

The Perfected Wang Zongzhen of the Western City sang:
*"Alas, only the suffering of a hesitant heart.
The Supreme Prime Perfected’s poem:
Eight winds coil through the green abode,
Thick mists suddenly disperse."*

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Second Scroll* states: "Evening feasts in the resplendent abode; at dawn, we gather the round radiance of flowers."

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Seventh Scroll*: The immortal Guo Sichao sang:
*"Thus I ascend the Great Tenuity Abode,
Drawing this golden pear nectar.
Carefree beyond the dark ravine’s edge—
Neither existing nor perishing."*

The *Scripture of the Numinous Writ* states: "The crimson abode shines with the Vermilion Youth, flourishing for ten thousand kalpas without withering."

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Eighth Scroll* states: "When mortals dwell in abodes and chambers, they must keep them pure and clean. Purity invites the influx of numinous qi, while impurity invites the influx of stale qi. When stale qi disrupts one’s abode, undertakings fail, and endeavors collapse. The same applies to the body—one must frequently bathe and cleanse; otherwise, there is no difference."

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Ninth Scroll* states: The immortal Ding Weining’s poem:
*"Form dwells in the northern frontier’s abode,
The Three Spirits roost in the Nine Heavens."*
And: "As for abodes, there are three kinds: first, the thatched hut; second, the myriad-eaved house; third, the walled enclosure."

*The Declarations of the Perfected, Tenth Scroll*: The Lady of the Central Watcher instructed: "Plant bamboo to the north of the abode."

The *Middle Scroll of the Scripture of the Great Cavern* states: "The secluded and desolate gives birth to the Emperor’s abode, bearing those of the radiant midst."

The *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern* states: "The eight winds transcend the transcendent abode, where dark mists drift through verdant fields." And: "Loosening robes in the Jade Sovereign’s abode, uniting with the luminous Perfected in resonance."

The *Golden Writ of the Immortal Record* states: "May I soar on wings to become an immortal, dwelling peacefully in the crimson abode."

The *Scripture of the Purple Radiance of Blazing Light* states: "Purple smoke coils through the winding abode, cinnabar radiance encircles the colored carriage." And: "Heaven is my roof, earth my bed. The Five Peaks and rivers are my bridges; the Dark Dipper and primordial essence are my garments."

The *Scripture of the Inner Perfected Golden Chapters* states: "If you constantly recite the verses of the Curved White Formula in the stillness of your sleeping abode, you will summon the spirits of the source of inauspicious marshes."

The *Scripture of the Seventy-Four Methods of Upper Clarity Transformations* states: "Vast and boundless, the dark void—golden chambers and jasper huts. The Three Primes initiate movement; the six qi scatter and spread."

The *Preface to the Scripture of Soaring Feathers* states: "The Nine Dawns do not descend upon the numinous abode; the lady rejoices upon her sleeping mat."

The *Scripture of the Seven Revolutions and Seven Transformations of the Divine Continent’s Dance in Heaven* states: "Leaving the dusty realm of the veiled wheel, the transcendent abode naturally communicates with the dark." And: "The wondrous breath of the Nine Dawns’ gale—ascending to the immortal lord’s hut."

The *Inner Biography of Master Pei* states: "The Supreme August Emperor ascended the Broad Cold Upper Clarity Numinous Abode to deliberate the diligence and laxity of those who study the Dao."

The *Scripture of the Pure Land of the Youth of Primordial Yang* states: "The city of Xiudu is walled entirely in crystal, its beams and pillars of pure gold. Lotus flowers cover its storied towers; coral forms its rafters, white silver its crossbeams, and yellow gold its brackets."

The *Hidden Writ of the Primordial Darkness* states: "The Lord of the Azure Youth invited the myriad emperors to the winding abode to expound the precious formulas in the wondrous chapters."

The *Petition Text of Upper Clarity* states: "The eight winds arise in the transcendent abode, where dark mists drift through the green carriage’s midst."

The *Scripture of Original Conduct* states: "There is the abode of the Cinnabar Mound, where divine beings bestowed the eight-character true writ of Wei’s sound."

The *Numinous Chapters of the Empty Cavern* state: "The jasper peak’s lush numinous palace—the hut of life, death, fortune, and virtue."

The *Nineteenth Scripture of Original Form* states: "The king of the southern lands constructed a divine immortal temple, with chambers and abodes all around, none unaccomplished."

The *Twentieth Scripture* states: "Beyond the Southern Sea, in the kingdom of Tuisuijia, there was a girl named Haoqiu. At fifteen, she studied the Dao at the Terrace of Summoning Souls for Immortal Practice. She attained immortality and ascended to the Jade Clarity Palace. The king then built an immortal abode at the site of her attainment—a Terrace of Assembled Spirits, a Hall of the Three Masters, and a Chamber of Scriptural Exegesis. He issued an edict throughout the land: all who could leave the household life came to this temple, and thus a thousand people from within the kingdom entered it."

The *First Scripture* states: "The immortal temple is where the divine reside—it is not a mortal abode."

The *Twelfth Scripture* states: "In the realm of Gouni, by the Wild Horse’s Pool, there is a hall of sages and worthies, with bronze walls and iron pillars, silver tablets above. It is where scholars cultivate and practice."

The *Lower Scroll of the Jade Characters of Inner Sounds* states: "When evil affinities are entirely exhausted, one dwells in the carefree, joyous abode, uniting with the flying heavens to merge with the Perfected."
